q: Few of Michael Vick 's supporters have been as staunchly behind Reid.`` He had a plan and he stuck to that, both on and off the field,'' Reid said. He knew certain things he wanted to get better at and he was open to the coaching on it, and he got himself back into shape.... So, he did a great job with the football part of it.`` And then he spends a tremendous amount of time in the public, in particular on his days off... speaking and doing the best he can to right the wrong. You can never erase that, but you can sure help change others from falling into that same problem. A star in Atlanta for most of his six seasons as a Falcon after being selected first overall in the 2001 draft, Michael Vick missed 2007 and 2008 while incarcerated for 18 months in a federal prison.

the six years during which he ran the Defense Department for President Bush - particularly because nearly two-thirds of the book deal with that relatively brief period in the author's life. But, as Donald Rumsfeld writes, he's never much of a handwringer, I don't spend a lot of time in recriminations, looking back or second-guessing decisions made in real time with imperfect information by myself or others. As seems typical of so much here, that's partially true; the author has no taste for self-criticism or second-guessing himself. Masterful bureaucratic survivor that he was until he ran out of room to maneuver

Talking to reporters on a conference call for his new music competition series,`` The X Factor,'' Simon Cowell says, I haven't seen a full episode. I've seen three minutes of a recap. From what I've seen and from what I've heard, it all seems to be going well. in Chicago, Dallas, Miami, New York/New Jersey, and Seattle. Singers and groups must be at least 12-years-old to audition. There is not a cap on the upper age limit. Congress. On Dec. 10, Sen. Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. His words are being assembled into a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. The book's publisher, Nation Books, says millions followed the speech online, crashing the Senate server. A print book is due out next month. An electronic book will be published Jan.

Revenue, however, dipped slightly from the third quarter on reduced shipments. It can safely be said that what Chrysler delivered last year, on both the product and financial fronts, surpassed many expectations, CEO Sergio Marchionne said.`` However, our job is not yet done.
